channel.description: Recent content in Blog on HEIR

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-11-07
item.description: Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2023-11-07.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-10-24
item.description:
Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2023-10-24.

Also of note: our talk at FHE.org was last Thursday (recording), and the similar talk at the LLVM developers meeting talk was the previous Wednesday, though the video has not yet been posted for that.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-09-26
item.description:
Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2023-09-26.

Next meeting (Oct 10) is canceled for the MLIR workshop, and I’ll post an update from that workshop on this blog, hopefully also with a video of the talk that Alex Viand and I will be giving at the LLVM developers meeting.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-09-12
item.description: Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2023-09-12.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-08-29
item.description: Here are the notes from the HEIR meeting on 2023-08-29. There was an issue with the recording, so there is no video recording this week.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-08-15
item.description: Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2023-08-15.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-08-01
item.description:
The fourth HEIR meeting was 2023-08-01 (notes and video recording).

We’re also starting on the Poly and Secret dialects in #74 (poly) and #78 (secret), so please join in the fun!

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-07-18
item.description:
The third HEIR meeting was 2023-07-18 (notes).

We decided to schedule future meetings every two weeks, with alternating focus on MLIR and Hardware. See the meeting calendar to join. (direct link to the calendar)

item.title: Blog: Hello, World!
item.description:
Hello, world! We’re starting a project to unify homomorphic encryption compiler IRs.

Our initial meeting was 2023-05-30 (read-only copy of the minutes). Stay tuned for future updates while we work out a meeting schedule.
